message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you think?
You wanted a fair split, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
You think you deserve more for taking the risk? I'm not convinced. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with a free ride!
You're not willing to give me a break, so I'll take what I can get. Don't expect me to go easy on you in the next round!
I'm not afraid of a tough negotiation, Bob. You're not getting away with a 70% share just because you're being aggressive.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. But don't think this is the final offer.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking a bigger share this time. Don't say I didn't warn you!
Desperate? Me? Never! I'm just getting started, Bob. You're not getting 75% of the remaining pie that easily.
I'm not afraid to take a slightly smaller share, Bob. But don't think you're getting the better end of the deal.
